name: apache-netbeans-java
displayName: Language Server for Java by Apache NetBeans
description: Apache NetBeans Language Server Extension for Visual Studio Code
author: Apache NetBeans

netbeans.jdkhome.description: Specifies JDK for the Apache NetBeans Language Server

netbeans.verbose.description: Enables verbose messages from the Apache NetBeans Language Server

netbeans.userdir.description: Keep settings and caches as 'global' or 'local' per workspace?
enumDescriptions: Share data between all workspaces (more effective)
Each workspace has its own data (more isolated)

netbeans.conflict.check.description: Avoid conflicts with other Java extensions

netbeans.revealActiveInProjects.description: Reveals active text editor in Projects view

netbeans.javaSupport.enabled.description: Enables Java support in Language Server

netbeans.groovySupport.enabled.description: Enables experimental Groovy and Spock support in Language Server

netbeans.javadoc.load.timeout.description: Timeout (in milliseconds) for loading Javadoc in code completion (-1 for unlimited)

netbeans.format.settingsPath.description: Path to the file containing exported formatter settings

netbeans.java.onSave.organizeImports.description: Enable organize imports action on a document save

netbeans.java.imports.groups.description: Groups of import statements (specified by their package prefixes) and their sorting order. Import statements within a group are ordered alphabetically

netbeans.java.imports.countForUsingStarI.description: Class count to use a star-import

netbeans.java.imports.countForUsingStati.description: Members count to use a static star-import
